pageSetting.title: 行员中间业务收入管理

attribute.value: select DMZ as key,DMMS as value from csb_dmms where dmmc = 'ZJYWSRKM'

col.title: 机构会计中间业务收入

attribute.value: select cast(coalesce(kmzz.kmye,0) as decimal(25,4)) as kmye,cast(coalesce(srje.srje,0) as decimal(25,4)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join jxdx_kmzz_$tjrq_nf$ kmzz on jg.jgdh=kmzz.jgdh and kmzz.zzrq=$tjrq_ym$ and kmzz.bz='01' and kmzz.kmh='$kmh$' left join ( select sum(coalesce(sr.srje,0)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy2 on jgcy2.jgkhdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy2.qsrq and jgcy2.jsrq and jgcy2.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ left join sglr_hyzjywsr sr on sr.khdxdh=jgcy2.khdxdh and sr.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and sr.kmh='$kmh$' where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq ) srje on 1=1 where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

select cast(coalesce(kmzz.kmye,0) as decimal(25,4)) as kmye,cast(coalesce(srje.srje,0) as decimal(25,4)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join jxdx_kmzz_$tjrq_nf$ kmzz on jg.jgdh=kmzz.jgdh and kmzz.zzrq=$tjrq_ym$ and kmzz.bz='01' and kmzz.kmh='$kmhCopy$' left join ( select sum(coalesce(sr.srje,0)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy2 on jgcy2.jgkhdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy2.qsrq and jgcy2.jsrq and jgcy2.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ left join sglr_hyzjywsr sr on sr.khdxdh=jgcy2.khdxdh and sr.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and sr.kmh='$kmhCopy$' where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq ) srje on 1=1 where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

select cast(coalesce(kmzz.kmye,0) as decimal(25,4)) as kmye,cast(coalesce(srje.srje,0) as decimal(25,4)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join jxdx_kmzz_$tjrq_nf$ kmzz on jg.jgdh=kmzz.jgdh and kmzz.zzrq=$tjrq_ym$ and kmzz.bz='01' and kmzz.kmh='$kmh$' left join ( select sum(coalesce(sr.srje,0)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy2 on jgcy2.jgkhdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy2.qsrq and jgcy2.jsrq and jgcy2.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ left join sglr_hyzjywsr sr on sr.khdxdh=jgcy2.khdxdh and sr.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and sr.kmh='$kmh$' where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq ) srje on 1=1 where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

select cast(coalesce(kmzz.kmye,0) as decimal(25,4)) as kmye,cast(coalesce(srje.srje,0) as decimal(25,4)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join jxdx_kmzz_$tjrq_nf$ kmzz on jg.jgdh=kmzz.jgdh and kmzz.zzrq=$tjrq_ym$ and kmzz.bz='01' and kmzz.kmh='$kmhCopy$' left join ( select sum(coalesce(sr.srje,0)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy2 on jgcy2.jgkhdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy2.qsrq and jgcy2.jsrq and jgcy2.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ left join sglr_hyzjywsr sr on sr.khdxdh=jgcy2.khdxdh and sr.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and sr.kmh='$kmhCopy$' where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq ) srje on 1=1 where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ as tjny,COALESCE(b.kmye,0) as jgkjzjywsr,dr.tjrq, hy.khdxdh,dr.kmh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,ms.dmms as srxm,dr.srje as hyzhywsr from sglr_hyzjywsr dr left join csb_dmms ms on dr.kmh = ms.dmz and ms.dmmc = 'ZJYWSRKM' inner join khdx_hy hy on dr.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and dr.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join ( select a.kmh, a.jgdh,sum(a.ym_kmye-a.sym_kmye) as kmye from ( select zzrq,jgdh,kmh,case when zzrq=$tjrq_ym$ then kmye else 0 end ym_kmye ,case when zzrq=$tjrq_sym$ then kmye else 0 end sym_kmye from jxdx_kmzz_$tjrq_nf$ where bz = '01' and kmh in(select dmz from csb_dmms where dmmc = 'ZJYWSRKM') and zzrq in($tjrq_ym$,$tjrq_sym$) )a group by a.jgdh,a.kmh )b on dr.kmh = b.kmh and jg.jgdh=b.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh=jgcy.khdxdh where 1=1 and dr.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and dr.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and dr.kmh='$srxm$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $tjrq$ as tjny,COALESCE(b.kmye,0) as jgkjzjywsr,dr.tjrq, hy.khdxdh,dr.kmh,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,ms.dmms as srxm,dr.srje as hyzhywsr from sglr_hyzjywsr dr left join csb_dmms ms on dr.kmh = ms.dmz and ms.dmmc = 'ZJYWSRKM' inner join khdx_hy hy on dr.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and dr.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join ( select a.kmh, a.jgdh,sum(a.ym_kmye-a.sym_kmye) as kmye from ( select zzrq,jgdh,kmh,case when zzrq=$tjrq_ym$ then kmye else 0 end ym_kmye ,case when zzrq=$tjrq_sym$ then kmye else 0 end sym_kmye from jxdx_kmzz_$tjrq_nf$ where bz = '01' and kmh in(select dmz from csb_dmms where dmmc = 'ZJYWSRKM') and zzrq in($tjrq_ym$,$tjrq_sym$) )a group by a.jgdh,a.kmh )b on dr.kmh = b.kmh and jg.jgdh=b.jgdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh=jgcy.khdxdh where 1=1 and dr.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and dr.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and dr.kmh='$srxm$' ) t

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select KMH, KHDXDH, SRJE,F_TIMETOCHAR(CZSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as CZSJ, CZR, TJRQ from SGLR_HYZJYWSR where 1= 1 and KMH = '$kmh$' and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select KMH, KHDXDH, SRJE,F_TIMETOCHAR(CZSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as CZSJ, CZR, TJRQ from SGLR_HYZJYWSR where 1= 1 and KMH = '$kmh$' and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq_ym$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGLR_HYZJYWSR( KMH, KHDXDH, SRJE, CZSJ, CZR, TJRQ ) values ( '$kmh$',$khdxdh$,$srje$,f_get_timestamp('$czsj$'),'$czr$',$tjrq_ym$)
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update SGLR_HYZJYWSR set SRJE = $srje$ where 1=1 and KMH = '$kmh$' and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq_ym$
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGLR_HYZJYWSR where 1=1 and KMH = '$kmh$' and KHDXDH = $khdxdh$ and TJRQ = $tjrq$
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select cast(coalesce(kmzz.kmye,0) as decimal(25,4)) as kmye,cast(coalesce(srje.srje,0) as decimal(25,4)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join jxdx_kmzz_$tjrq_nf$ kmzz on jg.jgdh=kmzz.jgdh and kmzz.zzrq=$tjrq_ym$ and kmzz.bz='01' and kmzz.kmh='$kmh$' left join ( select sum(coalesce(sr.srje,0)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy2 on jgcy2.jgkhdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy2.qsrq and jgcy2.jsrq and jgcy2.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ left join sglr_hyzjywsr sr on sr.khdxdh=jgcy2.khdxdh and sr.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and sr.kmh='$kmh$' where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq ) srje on 1=1 where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select cast(coalesce(kmzz.kmye,0) as decimal(25,4)) as kmye,cast(coalesce(srje.srje,0) as decimal(25,4)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh left join jxdx_kmzz_$tjrq_nf$ kmzz on jg.jgdh=kmzz.jgdh and kmzz.zzrq=$tjrq_ym$ and kmzz.bz='01' and kmzz.kmh='$kmhCopy$' left join ( select sum(coalesce(sr.srje,0)) as srje from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy2 on jgcy2.jgkhdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy2.qsrq and jgcy2.jsrq and jgcy2.khdxdh!=$khdxdh$ left join sglr_hyzjywsr sr on sr.khdxdh=jgcy2.khdxdh and sr.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and sr.kmh='$kmhCopy$' where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq ) srje on 1=1 where jgcy.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select DMZ as key,DMMS as value from csb_dmms where dmmc = 'ZJYWSRKM'

javascript.query: jQuery(document).ready(function () { }); //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ var obj = createTimeObj($('#tjrq').val()); $('#tjrq_ym').val(obj.ym); $('#tjrq_sym').val(obj.sym); $('#tjrq_nf').val($('#tjrq').val().substring(0,4)); return true; } /* function showAddEditDialog(){ var width = editpage_width||700; var height = editpage_height||500; custom_window('../studio/manageParser.do?method=toEditPage&operate=add&funId=hyzjywsrgl',width,height,'行员中间业务收入管理编辑'); }*/
javascript.edit: jQuery(document).ready(function () { //这里的js脚本，会在页面加载完成后执行 $('#tjrq_ym').val(createTimeObj($('#tjrq').val()).ym); $('#tjrq_nf').val($('#tjrq').val().substring(0,4)); if($("#page_operate").val() == "update"){ $("#tjrq").attr("disabled",true); } $('#jgxmsr').parent().parent().hide(); $('#kfpxmsr').parent().parent().hide(); var t1 = window.setInterval(function(){ var i = 0; console.log(i + "--" + $('#kmh').val()); i++; if($('#kmh').val().length > 0){ window.clearInterval(t1); if($('#page_operate').val() == 'update'){ $('#kmhCopy').val($('#kmh').val()); PAS.di.execute('hyzjywsrgl_selectZjywhz2',selectZjywhz2); }else{ PAS.di.execute('hyzjywsrgl_selectZjywhz',selectZjywhz); } } },200); $('#tjrq').blur(function(){ $('#tjrq_ym').val(createTimeObj($('#tjrq').val()).ym); $('#tjrq_nf').val($('#tjrq').val().substring(0,4)); PAS.di.execute('hyzjywsrgl_selectZjywhz',selectZjywhz); }); $('#khdxdh').change(function(){ $('#tjrq_ym').val(createTimeObj($('#tjrq').val()).ym); $('#tjrq_nf').val($('#tjrq').val().substring(0,4)); PAS.di.execute('hyzjywsrgl_selectZjywhz',selectZjywhz); }); $('#kmh').change(function(){ $('#tjrq_ym').val(createTimeObj($('#tjrq').val()).ym); $('#tjrq_nf').val($('#tjrq').val().substring(0,4)); PAS.di.execute('hyzjywsrgl_selectZjywhz',selectZjywhz); }); }); //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ var srje = $('#srje').val(); var kfpxmsr = $('#kfpxmsr').val(); if(parseFloat(srje) > parseFloat(kfpxmsr)){ custom_alert("同一机构下的行员中间业务收入合计必须小于该机构会计总数结果!"); return false; } return true; } function selectZjywhz(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ var kmye = obj.data[0].KMYE; var srje = obj.data[0].SRJE; $('#jgxmsr').val(new Number(kmye).toFixed(4)); $('#kfpxmsr').val(parseFloat(kmye-srje).toFixed(4)); PAS.di.setDone('hyzjywsrgl_selectZjywhz'); } } function selectZjywhz2(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ var kmye = obj.data[0].KMYE; var srje = obj.data[0].SRJE; $('#jgxmsr').val(new Number(kmye).toFixed(4)); $('#kfpxmsr').val(parseFloat(kmye-srje).toFixed(4)); PAS.di.setDone('hyzjywsrgl_selectZjywhz2'); } }
